body.name: Powkiddy X55 Handheld Game Console Built-in 30000 Games, 5.5-Inch IPS RGB, RK3566 CPU, Retro Arcade Handheld Game Console, Portable Video Gaming Console for Kids Adults (256G Green)
features: Powerful Core: Powkiddy X55 handheld CPU adopts RK3566, FPS perfect 60HZ operation, solve the problem of frame loss in the game, run the game perfectly, make the game screen more smooth, never worry about the game lag.

Games Formats: Retro Gaming Console is compatible with mainstream 64-bit 3D simulators and supports a variety of simulators. You can download and add games in the relevant formats according to your own preferences.

Multi-functional: With W-i-f-i and Blue--tooth, it can be played wirelessly online, support wireless joystick online, and can be played by multiple people. Can be connected to computer, TV, monitor, projector. Perfect gift for friends and family at Christmas and other festivals.

Large Screen: 5.5-inch high-definition IPS screen, 720x1280 resolution screen effect is very clear, give you a different visual enjoyment. Game language: English. System languages: English, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish.
Power Capacity: Built-in 4000mAh, supports up to 4 hours of gaming. It will bring you a lot of joy during your journey or long trip.
body.description: Powkiddy X55 Handheld 5.5-Inch Large Screen Game Console Built-in GamesSpecifications:.Material: ABS + Electronic Components.Color: White/Black/Blue/Green.System: JELOS System.Display: 5.5-inch IPS RGB Screen.CPU: Rock-chips RK3566, Quad-core ARM Cortex-A55, CPU Clock Speed: 1.8GHZ.GPU: ARM Mali-G52.RAM: LPDDR4X, 2GB.Memory: 16GB+64GB, 16GB+128GB, 16GB+256GB.TF Card: Support double TF card to expand up to 256GB.Languages: Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, English.Power: 4000 mAh, charged for 2 hours and last 4hours.Interface: Support TYPE-C fast charging, TV HDMI display, OTG-USB and 3.5MM standard headset port..Other Features: Support 3.5mm stereo headset, screen brightness setting, volume setting, sleep setting, game button setting, low power reminder, HDMI video output..Product Dimensions: 21.25 x 9.45 x 1.9cm.Product Weight: 293g.Package Dimensions: 24 x 12 x 6cm.Package Weight: 560g.Packing: Graphic CartonPackage Including.1*X55 Game Console.1*Type-c Charging Cable.1*Instructions
